phases.objective: Navigate to `https://www.goodbill.com` on a mobile browser.

assertions.description: Verify that the current URL is 'https://www.goodbill.com'.
Verify that verify the viewport size is consistent with a mobile device (e.g., width < 768px).

phases.objective: Tap the hamburger menu icon (if present) to open the mobile navigation.

assertions.description: Verify that the mobile navigation menu is visible or open.

phases.objective: Tap on 'Book a demo' from the navigation menu.

assertions.description: Verify that the user is navigated to the 'Request a Demo' page (URL contains '/demo').
Verify that verify the page title contains 'Request a Demo'.

phases.objective: Scroll down on the Demo page to locate the 'Upcoming webinar!' section.

assertions.description: Verify that the 'Upcoming webinar!' section is visible in the current viewport.

phases.objective: Tap the 'Register for' link associated with the webinar 'Intro to 501(r): The Hospital Discount Hiding in Plain Sight'.

assertions.description: Verify that the user is navigated to the webinar registration page (URL contains '/webinars/live/registration-may-2025').
Verify that verify the page title or a prominent heading confirms registration for 'Intro to 501(r)' webinar.
Verify that the current URL is 'https://www.goodbill.com'.
Verify that verify the page title contains 'Lower hospital bills' or 'Goodbill'.

phases.objective: Click on the 'Book a demo' button prominently displayed in the hero section.

assertions.description: Verify that the user is navigated to the 'Request a Demo' page (URL contains '/demo').
Verify that verify the page title contains 'Request a Demo' or 'Goodbill'.
Verify that the current URL is 'https://www.goodbill.com'.

phases.objective: Navigate to From the main navigation (or 'Solutions' menu), click the link to '501(r) Discounts'.

assertions.description: Verify that the user is navigated to the '501(r) Discounts' page (URL contains '/501r-discounts').
Verify that verify the page title contains '501(r) Discounts' or related content.

phases.objective: Navigate to From the main navigation (or 'Solutions' menu), click the link to 'Claim Reviews'.

assertions.description: Verify that the user is navigated to the 'Claim Reviews' page (URL contains '/claim-reviews').
Verify that verify the page title contains 'Claim Reviews' or related content.

phases.objective: Navigate to From the main navigation (or 'Solutions' menu), click the link to 'Member Experience'.

assertions.description: Verify that the user is navigated to the 'Member Experience' page (URL contains '/member-experience').
Verify that verify the page title contains 'Member Experience' or related content.

phases.objective: Click on the 'Book a demo' button (likely from the main navigation or footer).

assertions.description: Verify that the user is navigated to the 'Request a Demo' page (URL contains '/demo').
Verify that verify the page title contains 'Request a Demo' or 'Goodbill'.

test_files.name: Patient Seeking Hospital Bill Negotiation Services
test_files.title: Patient Seeking Hospital Bill Negotiation Services

assertions.description: Verify that the current URL is 'https://www.goodbill.com'.

phases.objective: Navigate to In the 'Got a hospital bill?' section, click the 'We help you negotiate, too' link.

assertions.description: Verify that the user is navigated to the patient services page (URL contains '/patients').
Verify that verify the page title contains 'We negotiate hospital bills' or 'Goodbill'.
Verify that the current URL is 'https://www.goodbill.com'.

phases.objective: Scroll to the website footer and click the 'FAQ' link.

assertions.description: Verify that the user is navigated to the FAQ page (URL contains '/faq').
Verify that verify the page title contains 'FAQ' or 'Frequently Asked Questions'.
